Articles.Content: Desided it was about time for me to draw my self a custom flag of my favourite videogame character and i have to say it went suprisingly well. ofcource its far from perfect but i like it . wouldnt be suprised if i had another go at creating a custom Tails flag. And yes it is a little mushy (blame microsoft paint), and i would have wanted to make the original drawring A4 sized but, if i try to make it smaller it will turn in to a pixelated mess (again paint). My original i only about 10x6cm sized so yea. And yes its hand drawn.
